GSD.description:
arm64: compat: Do not treat syscall number as ESR_ELx for a bad syscall

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit ad97425d23af3c3b8d4f6a2bb666cb485087c007. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: arm64: compat: Do not treat syscall number as ESR_ELx for a bad syscall
